intro.dedica:
Dedicated to Enza 
 who supported me in all this craze <3
intro.text7: There's a virus in my pc!

formHelp.title: The treat - help
formHelp.page0_content: Clear the viruses in all pc areas. Get as many points as you can and avoid enemy attacks.
formHelp.page1_content:
- The cursor can move in 8 directions in the scannerized area 
- The Primary attack is a laser that recharges over time. In case of overcharge the software will disable the laser for a few seconds.
formHelp.page2_content:
You can click on buttons and scripts to execute many actions, like gaining an ability, a powerup or interacting with the scannerized area.
You can only perform some actions in specific areas.
formHelp.page3_content:
By getting particular scripts, you gain a secondary attack:
- Missile: fast countdown, fires a missile dealing area-of-effect damage.
- Barrier: medium countdown, casts a barrier that absorbs enemy shots.
formHelp.page4_content:
Some scripts give you passive powerups:
- Hp bonus: gain one more health point
- Laser bonus: laser lasts longer
- Speed bonus: increased cursor speed
formHelp.page5_content: Every virus or malware can be indexed in different categories, depending on their offensive capabilities
formHelp.page6_content: Simple and linear moviments, enemy with low health.
formHelp.page7_content: low health, the enemy follows the cursor continuously
formHelp.page8_content: Doesn't move, has high health, can shot projectiles with variable targeting skill.
formHelp.page9_content: Uses simple movements, has high health, can shot projectiles with variable targeting skill.
formHelp.page10_content: Slow but continuous movements, high health, it is pretty big.
formHelp.page11_content: Isolated enemies with unique abilities. You'll often need scripts or a strategy to destroy it
formHelp.page12_content:
- You gain points by destroying enemies
- Bonus points are gained by keeping all your health intact, or by having a high accuracy.
- Only finishing the scan will let you save your score.

formCredits.title: The treat - Credits
formCredits.content_author:
Idea by Alessandro Falconi
Translated from WolfCorp
formCredits.content_pixelatorapp: For the intro, I've used the Pixelatorapp Free license
formCredits.content_music:

- Zapsplat.com

formCredits.content_ball: thanks to Ball for the laser audio asset

dialogBoot.dialogs_0: What if we won't be able to recover my holiday photos?
dialogBoot.dialogs_1: Keep calm. I developed The Treat at the university, it revealed itself to be a great antivirus
dialogBoot.dialogs_2: The Treat? did you gave a name to the program you've developed?
dialogBoot.dialogs_3: He's my baby, my sweet kid.... He's beautiful.. look at its graphics!
dialogBoot.dialogs_4: But everything is green, I don't understand anything!

dialogRetry.dialogs_0: I'm sorry, but things have gone bad... I didn't manage to destroy The Trick in your pc
dialogRetry.dialogs_1: Don't give up! We can always retry again, right?
dialogRetry.dialogs_2: Another try, you say? Why not... Now we know our enemy better than before!

dialogLogin.dialogs_0: Here we are in the login interface. C'mon, give me your password!
dialogLogin.dialogs_2: Only a 4-digit password? Then don't cry at me if you have these problems

dialogDesktop.dialogs_0: What's this? it seemed as if... it knows what we're trying to do
dialogDesktop.dialogs_3: Nope. It infected the browser but now the File System has been infected too.
dialogDesktop.dialogs_4: We must continue. Are you ready?

dialogFileSystem.dialogs_0: I've finally found you! you are mine!
dialogFileSystem.dialogs_1: You humans are so stupid and weak behind your simple user interfaces.
dialogFileSystem.dialogs_2: It doesn't matter, you're here now, and thus I'll destroy you!
dialogFileSystem.dialogs_3: The File system is under my control, this personal computer now belongs to me.

dialogEndGame.dialogs_1: You're my hero! Now can I have my pc back so I can download korean drama from the internet?
dialogEndGame.dialogs_4: First I need to save the scan's logs somewhere... just in case!
